name: Awsteroids
description:
Like asteroids, but even more awesome ! Every time you crash into an asteroid, you get a cool new spaceship. There are 12 unique spaceships you can use, then you win the game after you’ve used them all! 

Controls : WASD or Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to shoot. 

Shooting asteroids will get you points as follows: 

Large Asteroid: 20 pts

Medium Asteroid : 50 pts

Medium/Small Asteroid : 70 pts

Smallest Asteroid : 100 pts

This game was made for the Wowie Jam in 3 days with the theme “Failure is progress. Let’s mess with the concepts of winning and losing”. In this game, every time you fail, you progress with the new spaceships, and to win the game the fastest, crash into the asteroids as fast as you can ! Or, see how high a score you can get - post in the comments below !

If you liked this game, make sure to follow snowin for more awesome games ! :D

Music by the amazing neocrey https://neocrey.bandcamp.com. All art was CC0.
